column3: Sales and other operating revenues are attributable to countries based on the location of the operations generating the revenues and 2012 amounts are reclassified to correct the geographic alignment of certain revenues, primarily between the United Kingdom and other foreign countries.
Includes excise taxes on petroleum products sales: $13,866 million, $13,371 million, $13,955 million
Net of provision for income taxes on discontinued operations: $34 million, $27 million, $22 million
